short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A self improvement extension that rewards your stock when you visit learning and healthy websites and vice versa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A self-improvement motivational extension that has a fake stock of "you" which goes up when you visit a good site (Learning, Exercise, Knowledge) and goes down when you visit a fun site (Shopping, Social Media, YouTube)

This is aimed at getting you focused and motivated to do work. Now you can try to reach the leaderboard and rank up with quests! The ranks go from Bronze to Elite. 

Click here to see our official database of good sites and bad sites: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1liKm8bisV6bC-VEElNaVi6TCHRq33sCGTicHmGzV3vw/edit?usp=sharing

Developed by Revaant Srivastav and Edison Law
